flawed_nl_solution:
He spends 60/3=<<60/3=20>>20 minutes warming up
So he spends 60+20=<<60+20=80>>80 minutes at the gym per day
That means he spends 80*3=<<80*3=420>>420 minutes at the gym
So he spends 420/60=<<420/60=7>>7 hours at the gym a week
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 240, not 420. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
